relationships.description: Dumbledore is accompanying Harry on the boat.
Harry and Ron are friends, as evidenced by Harry giving Ron Felix Felicis.
Harry and Hermione are friends, as evidenced by Harry giving Hermione Felix Felicis.
Harry has romantic feelings for Ginny.
Harry met Professor Trelawney in the past.
Harry gave Felix Felicis to Ron and Hermione.
Dumbledore is guiding Harry on the boat, as evidenced by Dumbledore's instructions not to touch the water.
